Beforen weallum þingum, þat heo ne beo recceleas, ne litel ne telle of þare saule hælþe, &that; hyre beoþ beotehte, & ni hælþe] hælpe Hs. ‖ beoþ] beoht Hs. mon mare gyeme of eorðlice þingum, þe agað & atfeallað, ac æfre &yogh;eþence, þat he underfeng saule to gyemenne, for hwam hu sceal &yogh;ewistale upa&yogh;ifen. Þeh hit &yogh;elimpe, þat heo lytle æhte habbe, ne beo heo þas dryri, ac &yogh;emune, &that; hit &yogh;wryton &yogh;emune] &yogh;emne Hs. is: "Ærest seced Godes rice & his rihwisnesse & eallu þos eallu] eallū Hs. þing scullen beon yþ&yogh;eatæ" & eft &that; &yogh;ewrit se&yogh;eð: "Næng ne ateorede þan, þe of Gode beoð ofdræð". Wite eac se abbo|desse, þat heo þe saulan haueþ underfangan to witienne, &yogh;eare|wi&yogh;e haueþ] haueht Hs. hi seolfe to &yogh;ifonne andsware for heom, & wyte hu eac to soðe, &that; for hure ealre sawlan, þe buð under hyre anwealde, on domesdæ&yogh; heo sceal hi bitellen & ryht a&yogh;ylden for heom eallum & eac þar to eacen wiðuton ealcum twynun&yogh;e for hire a&yogh;enre sawle. And on þas wise æfre hu hyre ondrede, swa swa se hyrde deð, þenne he is sceap his hlaforde sceal beteace; þæ wile þe he is cari, þæt oþre ne misdon, he becumð þe werrer of him sylfe, & þenne he þurh his teacungen oþren heol|pod, oþren] auf d. Rand dies. Hd. nachgetr. himsylfe is &yogh;emacod cleane on þeawen.

3.0: III. HWENNE ME SCEALL LAÐIAN ÞA &YOGH;ESWUSTREN hrenne Hs. ‖ &yogh;eswustwen Hs. TO REDE.
3.1: Swa oft swa æni&yogh;e micela þing synd to donne on þan mynstre, se abbodesse &yogh;elaði&yogh;e togedere eall þone &yogh;eferscyepe & segge hyreself, hwæt þar beo to donne. And &yogh;ehyre þonne hyre sustre rædd & smea&yogh;e bæ hyre sylfro, and don la hwet hyre] byre Hs. ‖ & fehlt Hs. hyre þince betst. Ðarfore we habboð &yogh;esæd, &that; ealle beon &yogh;e|clypod betst] becst oder beest, doch eher das erstere. Hs. to reade, forþan þe oft God þare &yogh;ingeste &yogh;eswytoloð, þat selest is to donne.
3.2: Swa deh &yogh;ifon þa sustran red mid ealre underðydnysse & eadmodnesse, þat nan ne dyrstlæcæ mid anwilnesse to heal|dene hwet, swa heom þince, ac swyþost hit ga æfter þare swyþost] swyþorst Hs. ‖ æfter] after æft Hs. abbadesse wille, & þat &that; hyre betst licie to donne, ealle hyre betst] becst Hs. beon &yogh;ehyrsume. Ac swa swa hit &yogh;erysað, þat þa &yogh;ingran þam yldrum hyran, swa eac bycumð, þat se abbodesse wærlice and mid ryhte reade&yogh;ige ealle þing.
3.3: On eallum þingum ealle fylie þes re&yogh;ules wissunge, ne nan ne beo swa ðriste, þat fram hym abu&yogh;e; nan on þam mynstre hire a&yogh;enre heorte will fylia. Ne nan beo swa ðriste, &that; heo fylia] f&yogh;lia Hs. on&yogh;ean þa abbodasse wiðinne mynstre odðe widuton wiðorlice flite; gif hit ani deð, hu ah þarfore þolian þa re&yogh;ullice wrecæ. Wite se abbodesse þeah, eal &that; heo do, þat heo hit do mid Godes e&yogh;e & þes regoles healtrumnysse, forþam þe buton tweon, heo sceal ealre hire dome riht a&yogh;yldon beforan þan rihwisan deman on domesdæ&yogh;.
3.4: Gyf þonne æni&yogh;e læsse þing sy to donne on þes mynstres neodan, don bi þare hildestren swustrene rede, swa swa hit is &yogh;ewritan: "Ealle þing do mid rede, & æfter þære dæde ne reo|weð hit þe nefre."

4.0: IV. HER HIT SPECÐ HWYLCE SCEOLON BEON ÞA TOOL TO GODE WEORCA.
4.1: Erest man sceal lufian ure hlaford God ælmihti mid æalre heorte, mid ealre saule, mid eallum mæ&yogh;ne, & þaræfter ure nyhstan swa swa us sylfen.
4.2: Ðaræfter ne slean man; ne unriht hæme; ne stele; ne fylie yfoles lustas; ne bere lease &yogh;ewitnesse; wyrðian eallum men, & þat heo nelle, þat man do hire, ne don oðre. Widsacæ swa hi sulfa, þæt hu fyl&yogh;a Crist; wyldon hire lichame; softnissan næng beocleoppe; fæsten lufian. Earman wreccan hyþegian, Earman] earmman Hs. nacodum scride, unhalne neosie, deadne byrian, &yogh;eswænctum helpan, þæne sarienne frefrian. sarienne] sarien Hs. ‖ frefrian auf Rasur.
4.3: Fram þyssare woroldum dædum macian hine uncuð. Na þing beforan Cristes lufe setten. Wræððe næng fulfille, on þes time ne &yogh;eþence, ne healde faken on herte, ne &yogh;ife lease sibbe, ne soðe lufe forlæten. Ne sceal non swerie, læste hyre &yogh;elympe, folæten Hs. þat hu forswerie; soð of heorte & of muðe forþringan. Næng &yogh;elde yfol for yfele; ne don teone, & &yogh;ef heo buð hyre &yogh;edon, þildelicen forberan; hire fynd lufian; þa þa hi wergiað, næng cursian a&yogh;ean, ac þe swyðor bletsyan; ehtnysse for rihtwis|nysse for] danach Ras. eines r. þolian. Næng beon ofermod&yogh;, ne druncen&yogh;eorn, ne ofer|æte, ne slaw, ne slap&yogh;eorn, ne gneornende, ne teolende. Hire tohopan heo sceal habbon on God; þænne heo hwæt godes &yogh;eseicð on hire, &yogh;ecnawe hit of Gode & næng of hyre sylfre; þat yfol þat heo deð, æfre wite, þat heo hiresylf hit macuð & hire sylfre hu hit wite. Of domesda&yogh; beon ofdrad and of hellewite agrisan; &that; ecean lif mid ealre gastlicere &yogh;yrnfulnisse &yogh;yrnan; deað ealce de&yogh; habbon orwene beforan hyre e&yogh;an. de&yogh;, das &yogh; radiert. ‖ e&yogh;an, das a aus einem e corrig. oder um|gekehrt. Hyre lifes dedan &yogh;eman on elce tyde; on ælce stede wytan &yogh;ewis &that; God hy &yogh;esycð; þo yfole &yogh;eþanc, þe cumeð to hyre hurte, anan an Crist toslean & hyre gastlice lareowe hi&yogh; ope|nian. an fehlt Hs. ‖ hi&yogh;] im, davor Ras. cines B. (h?) Hs. Hire muð fram yfolre & fram unwrestere spece healdon; un|wrestere] unwrost., o anradiert, sodass es zu c ward, also unwrcstere Hs. fele specen nang lufie, ydele word & becomelice to leahtre specen, das 1. e ü. d. Z. næng specen; michelne hleahter oððo cinkinde næng lufyen. Hali&yogh;e rædinge bliþelice &yogh;ehyran; on &yogh;ebeden beon &yogh;elome; &yogh;ehyran] ehyran, davor Ras. eines þ, auch h auf Ras. Hs. hyre misdædum, þe heo &yogh;edon hafod, mid tearan oððo mid bereofunge elche de&yogh; on hyre &yogh;ebeden andættian ure drihte, & hi&yogh; sylue þarwið æfreft &yogh;escylde.
4.4: Hyres fleaches lustas næng &yogh;efullan; hyre a&yogh;en &yogh;ewill hatian; on ælle þingum þare abbodesse hæse beon &yogh;ehyrsum, hæse, s aus r rad. þeh heo hyresylf do hoðerlicer, sy þat heo ne mote, þenne heo lære; beon &yogh;emundi þare drihtanliccan hese, þe þus is &yogh;ecwede: drihtanliccan] -ccar, danach Ras. von 1-2 Buchstaben Hs. "Doð þat ih &yogh;eou seggað, ac &that; &that; hi&yogh; heomsylf doð, ne wilni&yogh;e ih &yogh;eou] ih&yogh; dann Ras. 1 B., darauf eou Hs. &yogh;e to donne." Nang wilni&yogh;e &that; me hi&yogh; telle hali, ær hieo hali sy, ac erer beon hali &that; hit syðnes ma&yogh;e þe seðlicer beon syðnes ma&yogh;e] dazwischen Ras. v. 2-3 B. ‖ þe seðl.] þe seðlices, dazwischen Ras. v. 1-2 B. Hs. &yogh;esed; Godes beboden ælce dei mid wercen heo sceal &yogh;efellan, & clænnesse lufian; nane man hatian; ande & nuð nang hab|bon; nane] das 1. n aus m rad.; über dem a ein ( Zeichen für n), das aber wieder getilgt ist; -e auf Ras. ne &yogh;eflit lufian; upahefodnysse forfleon; hwyrðian hure lufian] l fian Hs. uldran; hyre &yogh;ingran lufian on Cristes lufe; for hyre fynd &yogh;ebiddon; wið þa wrangsehtan, ær sunne go to glade, fre|ondscipe macian; & be Godes mildcsa næfre ofertriwian.
4.5: Efne nu þis synd þes gaslices tol & &yogh;ebytle; &yogh;if hi&yogh; þurh ofertriwian, das 2. i ü. d. Z. us dæ&yogh;es & nihtes un&yogh;eswicenlice wurðoð nu &yogh;efillede & on domesdæ&yogh;e us eft betehte, þeo mede at ure drihtene us ðonne betehte bis at auf d. Rande nachgetragen vom 1. Cor|rector. byð &yogh;egoldon, þe he himsilf behet, þat is: "Þat mannes e&yogh;e e&yogh;e, davor ein &yogh; rad. ne &yogh;eseh, ne eare &yogh;ehyr(de), ne on mannes hyrte ne astah, &yogh;ehyrde] &yogh;ehyr, r anradiert, danach Ras. von 2 Buchst., wie cs scheint &yogh;e. þe drihte hafod &yogh;e&yogh;eared þan þe hine lufieð. Þa stowwen &yogh;e&yogh;eared] zu &yogh;e&yogh;earewed corrigiert vom 1. Corr. þe üb. d. Z. nachgetr. v. 1. Corr. hwar we ealle þos þing ma&yogh;e sycerlice wyrcæn, beod þes lufied] l fied Hs. mynstres claustren ænd myd stedefestnesse on ðare &yogh;efer|reddene.

5.1: Se forme æadmodnysse stæpe is hyrsumnysse wiðuton stæpe] sccepe Hs. ælcun&yogh;e. Þeos &yogh;eðafnað heom, þe na þing lewfre heom ne læ|toð lewfre wie es scheint aus leofre corrig. v. 1. Corrector. þonne Crist, for þam hali&yogh;e þeowdome, þe hi&yogh; habbod be|hate, odðo for hellewite ofdrædædnysse, odðo for þæs ecean lifes wuldre. Sona swa heom æni þing fram heore ealdre beboden byd, hi þæt buton elcunge mid weorce &yogh;efremmað, swylce hit fram Gode sylfe &yogh;eboden sy. Be swilcum drihten þus cwyð: "Of eares hlyste hi&yogh; hyrsumede me"; eft he se&yogh;ð þus aus þur rad. Hs. ‖ cwyð] cþyð Hs. to þam lareowum: "Þe þe eow &yogh;ehyrð, he &yogh;ehirð me, & þe þe eow ascunoð, he ascunod me". ascunod] danach ein e rad. Hs.
5.2: Eornestlice, þa þe swylce synd, sona swa heom beboden byð, heore a&yogh;ene willan aweorpað & swa hwilce dædan, swa hi&yogh; on hande habboð, unfullworhte lætað & mid hwatum hyr|sumnysse fet þæ beodenden stefne mid weorce &yogh;efol&yogh;iad, & swilce on anre handhwile seo forsæde dæs lareowes hæs & þa fulfremede þes leorningmannes weorc mid Godes e&yogh;es cafscipe &yogh;emænelice buta þa þing beod &yogh;efillede.
5.3: On swilcum wunad seo lufu þæs færeldes to ecum life, forþi þonne hi&yogh; þone ancgsuman wei&yogh; &yogh;eceorad, be þam se hælend cwyd: "Angsum & nearu is se wei, þe to life let", Angsum] zwischen g und s Ras. eines Buchst. ( wahrscheinl. c). þat is, þat hi&yogh; be heore a&yogh;enum dome ne libbe, ne heore a&yogh;enum lustum ne &yogh;ehyrsumian, ac be frendum mode & hæse hæse, s aus r rad. Hs. donde sy, on mynstre wuniende, þæt abbodesse heom wealde & tæce a &yogh;ewilniad. Buton tweon, þa þe þyllice beod, hi&yogh; &yogh;eefenlæcced þone cwyde, þe drihten be him sylfe þus cwæd: &yogh;eefenlæcced] aus &yogh;eefonl. rad. Hs. andsware] andware Hs. "Ne com ic to donde myne a&yogh;enum willan, ac þas þe me sende". Þos sylue hirsumnysse bid Gode andfenge & mannum luftyme, &yogh;if þæt &yogh;ebodene byd &yogh;efremed unforhtlice, unsleaplice & unasolcenlice & buton ceorunge & butan nellendre andsware; seo hyrsumnisse to sode, þe bid þam ealdrum &yogh;e&yogh;earewod, heo byd Gode &yogh;edon; he sodlice þus sylf cwed: "Se þe eow &yogh;e|hirde, he &yogh;ehyrde me". And mid gode mode & gledum &yogh;eþonce mid] mud Hs. da underdiddan leornestran heore ealdrum hyran scullan, for|þam "þeo glæde &yogh;efestre God lufad"; witodlice, þeah hwilc leornestra hyres ealdres hæse mid weorcum &yogh;efylle & &that; mid hæse] aus hære rad. Hs. mude beceorad odde mid mode besor&yogh;aþ, ne byd hit Gode andfenge, þe ælces mannes heortan þurhsyhd, ænd for swylcere andfenge, d. üb. d. Z. dæde hu nane mede æt Gode ne onfehd, ac &yogh;yt ma on ecum wite mid þam murcnerum, & gnorniende, þe Gode mishyrdon, beod &yogh;eset, buton heo mid fulre dædbote hit &yogh;ebete.

6.0: VI. HER HIT SPECÐ EMBE SWI&YOGH;E þAT IS EMBE SILENCE.
6.1: Vtan don swa swa þe wite&yogh;a myne&yogh;ad, þus cwedende: "Ic sede, ic wille healde mine wegas, þat ic ne gylte þurh mine tungan; ic sette mine mude weardunge, ic adumbode & becom eadmod & swigede goddere spæce." Mid þisum wordum þisum aus þirum radiert. þe hali&yogh;e wite&yogh;a &yogh;eswutelad, þæt we scullan ydele worda for synnne wite &yogh;swigian: þanne he for swi&yogh;unge mæ&yogh;ne oft god|dere spæce &yogh;eswac, eornestlice man sceal idelre worde &yogh;eswican.
6.2: Þeah fulfremedan leornustran for swi&yogh;unga &yogh;ehealtsumnysse fulfreme — Zeilenschluss — medan Hs. seldhwænne leafe &yogh;eseald sy to specene embe hali&yogh;e spece & gode & fremfulle, forþi þe hit is &yogh;ewritan: "On mycelre spece þu næ forflihst synna"; & eft is awriten: "Dead & lif is on Dead, initiales D oder Ð. þare tungan handen". Forþan þe spece & tæce þare ma&yogh;stre &yogh;edafnad, swi&yogh;ie & &yogh;ehyre þare leornestre &yogh;erist. And forþi &yogh;yf hwet to axsyenne sy, þat beo þonne &yogh;eaxsod of þare ealdre mid ealre eadmodnysse & underþidnisse & mycelre arwyrþnysse, læste heo mare spæce, þenne hit fremye. Gabbunge oddo idele worde & þa, þe leahter aræred, mid ecæne loce on ælcen steden we fordyttod, & to swilcere spæce we ne alyfod, &that; þeo Das zweite we aus þe radiert. leornestre hyre mud undo.

7.1: Þæt godcunde &yogh;ewrit, swustre, us to eadmodnysse myne|gad, þus clypiende: "Ælc þe hi ahefd, sceal beon &yogh;eniþerod, & þeo þe hi &yogh;enyþerod, sceal beon &yogh;ehe&yogh;od". Þurh þas cly|punge Nach hi Rasur eines Striches oder Buchstaben. is &yogh;eswutelod, þat ælc upahafenesse aspringad of mo|dinesse cynne; wid þone unþeaw hine bewerode þe wite&yogh;a, unþeaw aus unþeaþ radiert. ‖ wite&yogh;a, das w wegradiert Hs. þus cweþende: "Drihten, nis min heorte onhefd, ne myne ea&yogh;en upabrodene; ne ic ne ferde on michele þinga, ne ic of wunder|lican on] om Hs. þingan me ne bestag. Ac hwæt, gif ic eadmodlice ne lett of me sylue, ac mine sawle aheof? swa swa þæt suceling, lett] lect Hs. þe his moder hafod forworpan, forfærd & forweornad, ell swylc edlean on mine sawle becume".
7.2: Forþi, leofen sustren, &yogh;if we þæne hrof þare heahlican eadmodnysse aræcen willat & to þere heofonlican anhefednysse, þe mid þises andwearden lifes eadmodnysse byd &yogh;esti&yogh;an caflyce cuman þeanced, seo hledre is mid urum dedum to ræ|renne, caflyce, das a radiert. þe Jacob on sweuene weard onywed, þurh þa hym weron &yogh;eswotelede æ&yogh;þer &yogh;e upsti&yogh;ende englas &yogh;e nudersti&yogh;ende. Nis buton tweon to understondenne se upsti&yogh;e & se nuþersti&yogh;e understondenne aus understondonne radiert. on nan oþre wisan, butæn þet heofona rices upsti&yogh;e mid ead|modnysse &yogh;eernod byd & mid ofermodnysse forworht. Seo aræræde lhedre tacnad ure lif on þissere worelde, þæt mid eadmodere heortan þurh urne hlaford aræred is to hefene; þare hlæddre twa sydan tacniad urne lycame & ure sawle; on þan sydum mystlicæ stæpas of æadmodnysse & of þeawfæstnysse seo godcunde laþunge to sti&yogh;ende upp mid hafod &yogh;efæstnod. laþunge, zw. þ und u ein i radiert.

0.8: VIIb. BE ÞAN TWELF STEEPEN OF EADMODNESSE; ÞIS IS ÞE FORMA STÆPE. Se forma eadmodnysse stæpe is, þæt &yogh;ehwa Godes e&yogh;e stæpe] s&yogh;epe Hs. habbe & ætforan his ea&yogh;ena &yogh;esyhþe æfre sette & ne sy for|&yogh;yttel ac &yogh;emyndi ealre þare þinga, þe ure drihten bebead, & on hwylce wise þa, þe God forseod, for heore synne reosed into helle; & þat ece lif, þe heom is &yogh;e&yogh;ærewed, þe beod of Gode ofdred, æfre mid hyre mode behealde & &yogh;eþence. And þus sme&yogh;ende &yogh;ehealdan hi&yogh; on elce tyman fram And] f., dafür Ras. v. 1-2 Buchst. Hs. hyre synnum & leahtrum æ&yogh;þer &yogh;e &yogh;eþohta, &yogh;e spæce, &yogh;e &yogh;e|syþa, & fram ealle yfelum dædum, & eac heora fleasclican lustes caflice forwurpe; wite manne &yogh;ehwilc, þat he bid æfre zwischen æfre und &yogh;esewen Rasur eines a. &yogh;esewen fram drihtne on heofonum on ælcne tyman; on ælcere stowe his dæde bed &yogh;esawene fram godcundre &yogh;esyhde & on &yogh;esawene, s aus r radiert. ælcene tyman fram englum bebodede; þat God on ure &yogh;eþoh|tum andweard is, se wite&yogh;a &yogh;eswutelad þus cweþende: "God asmead æ&yogh;þer &yogh;e manne heortan & eac heore æddre"; eft he cwyd: "God wat mannum þencunge, þat hi&yogh; beod wace"; wat] aus þat radiert. eft he cwed: "Drihten, þu on&yogh;eate mine &yogh;eþohtes feorrene", & "Mannes &yogh;eþonc þe &yogh;eandet". Toþi þæt heo carefull sy ymbe hyre þweoran &yogh;eþohtas, æfre sy nytwyrda swuster þus mid hyre heortan clypie: þonne ic beo unawemmud beforan Gode &yogh;yf ic me &yogh;ehealde fram mynre unrihtwisnesse. Vre a&yogh;en willa us is forboden, þonne hal&yogh;e &yogh;ewrit þus hal&yogh;e] hal danach Ras. eines &yogh;, danach Zeilenschluss Hs. clypad: "Gecyr fram þinum lustum"; eft: on &yogh;ebede we hel|siad we aus þe radiert. urne drihten, þat is willa on us beo &yogh;emacod. Ernestlice, we synd &yogh;elerede be &yogh;ewyrhton, þæt we urne a&yogh;ene willan ne weorcean, þonne we þæt forbu&yogh;ad, &that; &that; hal&yogh;e &yogh;ewrit us sei&yogh;þ, þus cweþende: "Sume we&yogh;as syndon, þe mannum synd rihte &yogh;eþuhte, þare ænde þeah besencd on helle grunde"; & eft we sculen forbu&yogh;æ &that; &that; is &yogh;esed beo þam &yogh;emelease: "Hi synd &yogh;ewemmode & andsæte &yogh;ewordene an hyre a&yogh;en luste". Wite we eac to soþen, &that; drichten æfre byd anweald on we aus þe radiert. ‖ Zwischen æfre und byd ein a radiert. urum flæsclicum lustum, & hym ures an&yogh;ynnes nan þing di&yogh;le beod; þat &yogh;eswutelod se wyte&yogh;a, þus to Gode clypienda: "Be|foran þe, drihten, is eal min willnung". Toscuniende is forþi yfel wyllung, forþan þe dead is &yogh;eset biside lustes infære; her of þat hal&yogh; &yogh;ewrit spæcd, þus cweþende: "Ne far þu æfter þinum lustum". Nu þonne &yogh;if Godes ea&yogh;an behealded þa godan & swa yfelen, & ure drihten of heofene locad uppe mannum bearn, þet he &yogh;eseo, hweþer hera æn&yogh; and&yogh;yttol sy & God secende, þet] &that; et Hs. ‖ æn&yogh;, das &yogh; rad. Hs. & fram þam englum, þe ofer us beod &yogh;eset, ure dædan da&yogh;es and nihtes God ælmihtin, ure scyppendum, beod &yogh;ecudde — on ælce tyma is to warienne, swa swa þe wite&yogh;a se&yogh;d on þan sealme, &that; we ne buh&yogh;ende into yfele & unfremfulle &yogh;emacod we aus þe radiert . on suman timan beon of Gode &yogh;esewe, & us þeah on þisne þisne] þirne Hs. tyman ary&yogh;e, forþam þe he milde is & abidad, þæt we to beteran &yogh;ecyrran, segge to us eft on þare odre worolde: "þas þing &yogh;e dyden, & ic swi&yogh;ode". Oder. Þe oder eadmodnesse stæpe is, þæt &yogh;ehwa his a&yogh;ene wil|lan ne lufie, ne hyre a&yogh;ene lustes &yogh;efylle, ac mid dedum ures drihtenes stefne &yogh;eefenlæce, þe þus be him silfe cwed; "Ic ne com to donde myne o&yogh;ene willan, ac þæs þe me sende". Eft þæt &yogh;ewrit seyd: "Gewill hafed wite, & neade wuldorbeah &yogh;e&yogh;earwad", þat is, &that; &yogh;ehwa hi sylfe to &YOGH;ode nyde & hyre a&yogh;ene lustes aweorpe. Þridde. Þe þridde eadmodinesse stæpe is, þæt &yogh;ewilc for Godes lufan mid ealre &yogh;ehyrsumnysse hyre ealdrum abu&yogh;e, fyliende urne drihte, be hwam þe apostel þus cwed: "He becom &yogh;ehyr|sum anan to deaþe". Zwischen to und deaþe Rasur von þan. Feorþe. Þe feorþe eadmodnysse stæpe is, &yogh;if heo on þare sylfan hyrsumnesse on heardum & on wyþerweardum þingum & on &yogh;ehwilcum teonrednum &yogh;eþyld lufian & ne awaciæ, na ne hyre staþel ne forlæte, ne awe&yogh; ne &yogh;ewite fram Gode, swa swa staþel] stþel Hs. þæt &yogh;ewrit sei&yogh;þ: "Se þe þurhwunod od ænde, he beod &yogh;eheal|dæn"; eft is &yogh;ecweden on hal&yogh;e &yogh;ewrite: "Sy &yogh;estrangod þin heorte & forþyldi&yogh;a þinna drihten" &that; is, þole eal, þat God be þe &yogh;eþafod. And eft is onywed, þat þe &yogh;etrywfullan for Godes &yogh;etrywf., t auf Rasur . e&yogh;e ealle liues wiþerweardnesse þoli&yogh;an scule, swa swa þæt scule aus reule radiert . &yogh;ewrit be heore þolemodnysse þus cwed: "For þe, drihten, we synd ealne dee&yogh; to deaþe &yogh;ewæhte; we synd to deaþe &yogh;etealde swa swa þa snidsceapp"; hi þeah sicera be þam tohopan be] beo Hs. þes godcundes edleanes, þus æfterfilyendlice mid blysse cly|piad: "Ac on eallum þis þingum we oforswiþdon þurh þane, we aus þe radiert . þe us lufede", þat is drihton; eft bi þare ylcan þolemodnesse on hal&yogh;e &yogh;ewrite is þus &yogh;ecweden: "Drihten, þu us afondedest, &yogh;ecweden] &yogh;ecwenden Hs. þu] þa Hs. þu us ameredest mid fyre, swa swa seolfer byd amered; þu us belæddest on grin, þu &yogh;esettest &yogh;edrefednesse on urne rigge"; &yogh;edrefedn.] &yogh;erfednesse, darüber ein Kreuz, das über vielen Correcturen steht und hier unbeachtet geblieben ist. eft þæt ylce hali&yogh;e &yogh;ewrit fordan &yogh;eswutelode, &that; we under ealdre &yogh;ymene beon sculon, þus cweþende: "þu settest menn ofor hyre heafde". Ge eac Godes bebeod on earfoþlican þingan & on heafde] heaheafde Hs. ‖ Zwischen on und earfoþl. über der Zeile von spätrer Hand ein zweites on. teonfullen þurh þolebyrdnysse &yogh;efyllod, &yogh;if hi beod &yogh;esmitan on &that; an hleor, wend ford þæt oþer; þam þe þæne cyrtel be|nymd, læted to þæne mentel; &yogh;yf hi beod &yogh;enidd to gande þam aus þann radiert . forberd & ehtnesse þolad for rihtwisnysse & þa, þe hi cursi&yogh;od, bletsiad. Fifta. Þe fifta eadmodnyssa stape is, &yogh;if þeo mynecena þurh eadmodre andetnesse hyre abbodysse ne di&yogh;lad ealle þa yfole &yogh;eþanc, þe comed to hyre heorte, & þa yfele dædan, þe heo dæd odde di&yogh;ellicen hafod &yogh;edon. Be þam halie &yogh;ewrite us halie aus hal&yogh;e corrigirt . myne&yogh;ad, þus cweþende: "Vnwreoh God ealmihtye þinne wey, myne&yogh;ad aus myn&yogh;ad corrigirt . ‖ wey aus we&yogh; corrig . þat is, þine dæde & hiht an hine; & eft hit cwyd: "Andettad to ure drihten, forþam þe he is god, forþam þe is miltsa is on ecnesse"; & eft cwed se wite&yogh;a: "Minne gylt ic cydde þe, & myne unrihwisnysse ic ne hydde; ic cwæd, ic wylle bodi&yogh;e to&yogh;enes me myne unrihtwisnessen min drihten, & þu me foryefe drihten auf Rasur . ‖ foryefe] forwefe, das w anradiert mynre heorten arleasnesse. Syxte. Þe syxte eadmodnysse steepe is, &yogh;yf þare mynecene byd &yogh;ecweme, &that; heo unwyrdost & lætemæst beo &yogh;eteald, & to eallum þam þingum, þe hyre beod betæht to donde, tellan hy syluen yfolne wrihtan & unwyrdna & þus mid þam wite&yogh;an clypie: wite|&yogh;an, e über der Zeile, Hs. "To nane þinge ic eam bycuman, & ic hit nyste; swa swa þat nyten ic eom &yogh;eworden to&yogh;eanes þe, & æfre ic eom myd þe. Seofaþe. Þe seofaþe eadmodnysse stæpe ys, &yogh;if þeo mynecena hi sylue uttran & unweorþest telle, na &that; an mid hyre mude secge and ec mid hyre heorte fæstlice &yogh;elife, hy sylue &yogh;eadmede & and] an Hs. ‖ ec aus &yogh;ec radiert . þus mid þan wite&yogh;an cwede: "Ic eam &yogh;ewis wyrm & næng man, manenen edwit & folces æwyrp". "Anhafen ic eam & edwit auf Rasur, wovon der 1. Buchst. ein w. &yogh;enydered & &yogh;escænd"; & eft se wite&yogh;a se&yogh;d: "God is me, drihten &that; þu me &yogh;enyþeradest, þat ic ma&yogh;e leornie þine beboda". Eahteþa. mynenecena Hs. ‖ þing] þng Hs. Þe eahteþa eadmodnysse stæpe is, &yogh;if þeo mynecena nan þing ne deþ, buten þat se &yogh;emæne mynsterre&yogh;ol tæcd, oddo þat þare heahþungenra forbisena lærad. heahþungenra] heahþunge ura Hs. Ny&yogh;ede. Þe ny&yogh;ede eadmodnysse stæpe is, &yogh;ef þeo mynecena hyre tunga forwyrnod to specende & habbon swi&yogh;unga & ne spæce, ær he beo &yogh;eahsod, forþan þat hali&yogh;e &yogh;ewrit swutelod, &that; on maniefealde spece ne byd syn forbo&yogh;en, & forþi þe se fæle talyende man uppon eorþe ne &yogh;eþihd. &yogh;eþihd] &yogh;e dann ein anradiertes f, dann ein radiertes i (?) hierauf hd. Hs. Teoda. Þe teoda eadmodnysse stæpe is, &yogh;if þeo mynecena ne beo galsmere & ræd on hleahtre, forþi þe hit is &yogh;ewritan: "Se gi|die þe] he, das h etwas anradiert Hs. on his hleæhtre his stefene onhefd". Endlyfta. Þe endlyfta eadmodnyssa stæpe is, &yogh;if þe mynechena, þenne heo spece, lyþelice, buton hleahtre, eadmodlice mid þeaufulre hefynesse feawe word & &yogh;erædelice speca, & ne beo oferlud on hire stefene, swa swa hit awriten is: "Se þe wis is, mid fæwum wordum he hit swutelad". Twelftæ. Þe twelfta eadmodnysse stæpe is, &yogh;if þe mynecena na þat an mid hyre heorte, ac eac mid hyre lycame eadmodnysse eallum þam, þe hyre onlociad, æfre sceawi&yogh;e, þæt is on weorce, on &yogh;ebedhuse, on mynstre, on wyrtearde, on we&yogh;e, on felde, oddo swa hwar swa heo sy sittende, standende, oddo gangende, æfre beo hniwiende mid hyre heafede, hyre &yogh;esihda adun on hniwiende] hnipiende Hs. eorþan besette. And tellan hy sylfe scyldi&yogh; on ælcene timan tellan, e auf Ras. ( eines i?). for hyre synnan, & ho&yogh;ien æfre, swylce hu to þan e&yogh;fulle Godes dome þeryhte &yogh;eled sculle beon; æfre on hyre herte segge to hyre sylfre, &that; &that; se manfulle on þam godspelle besettum ea&yogh;um besettum] besectum Hs. on þa eorþan cwed: "Drihten, ic sunfulle ne eom weorþe, þat ic mine ea&yogh;an to heofonum ahebbe"; & æft mit þam wyta&yogh;e: "Ic eom &yogh;ebi&yogh;ed æ&yogh;hwar & &yogh;eniþerod". Syddan þeo mynecene eallan þas eadmodnysse upstæpes &yogh;estihd, heo cymd sone to þare sodan Godes lufe, þe e&yogh;e utan drifd; þurh þa lufe ealle þa þing, þe heo ær heold næng wid|uton 26-27. utan drifd] ut anrifd Hs. heold] heod Hs. ofdrædædnesse, ac buton æn&yogh;e &yogh;eswynce swilce &yogh;ecun|delice for þare &yogh;ewunsumnysse heo be&yogh;ynd to healdenne, na for hellewites e&yogh;e, ac for Cristes lufe & for þare sylfre goddere &yogh;ewunsumnesse & þæwæne licunge. Þe ure drihte on his wyrhte, his aus þis radiert. sone swo he byd clæne of unþæawon & of synnum, bliþelice swutelod.
0.9: VIII. BE CRISTES ÞENUNGE ON NIHT. On wintres tyman, þæt is fræm þan an&yogh;inne þæs monþes, is fehlt Hs. þe is nouember &yogh;ehaten, fort eastron, æfter &yogh;escæades fore|sceawunge on þare eahtaþan tide þare nihte is to arisenne, þæt þa mynecene sum del mare reston þanne healfe þe niht, þæt seo dæ&yogh;es þi&yogh;en tofered sy on þare nihtlican reste & seo hæte þere þi&yogh;ene ofersle&yogh;en & se ma&yogh;e &yogh;elyht & swa arysen. &yogh;elyht, ht auf Rasur von etwas spätrer Hand. Þæt þære nihte to lafe sy after þam utsange, þæt sy &yogh;enoted utsange] unstrange, über un von späterer Hand ut, Hs. mid sealmsonge & mid leornunge gastlycere cræfte butan slæpe. Fram eastron odd þa foresædan kalendes nouembris swa sy &yogh;emeto&yogh;od þæs uhtsanges time, þæt a litol wile þæræfter æfter] ælter Hs. beo &yogh;ehealden, þat þa sustren ma&yogh;ie gan ut to &yogh;ecyndrelicere neode, & fylie anan þone dæ&yogh;rædsang, se is to a&yogh;ynnenne, þonne þæs dæ&yogh;es lyht a&yogh;ynd.

10.0: IX. HU FELE SEALMAS SYND TO SEC&YOGH;ENDE ON NIHTLICERE TIDE.
10.1: On wyntres timen is se utsang þus to bæ&yogh;ynnenne; ærest beo &yogh;eredd þis fers: " Deus in adiutorium meum intende"; þonne þaræfter ist o seggenne þriwwe: "Domine labia mea aperies, et os meum annuntiabit laudem tuam"; heræfter scel beon &yogh;esed se þridde sealm: "Domine quid multiplicati sunt", mid "Gloria patri", þonne "Uenite exultemus domino " mid antæfne oddo abuton antæfne is to singenne; fyly&yogh;e þonne se ambro|sianisce is] if Hs. ymne, þonne six sealmes mid heore antæfnen. Æfter þan sealmun beo þonne &yogh;esed þat uerss & þare abbodesse bletsunge, & sitten þonne ealle on heore stolum; rædon þonne sitten] rihten, r unten anrad. Hs. þa swustre embestunde on þare boc on uppen þan bocscæmele þreo reddingan & singan þry&yogh; repsæs. Æfter þare þriddan ræ|dunge þeo, þe synga, segge þane gloria; sonæ swa þeo singestre þane gloria a&yogh;ynnæd, anan ealle þa swustren arisen of heore sæte for arwyrþnesse þare hali&yogh;e þreomnesse. Æfter þan ut|sangan reden mæn þa becc godcundre lare æ&yogh;þor &yogh;e of þare ealdon æ, &yogh;e of þare nywe, & eac heore trahtes, þe namcuþe &yogh;e] &yogh;ec Hs. fæderes & ryhtbelyuedum larþeawes &yogh;eworht habbod. Æfter þis þreom ræddungen mid heore repsan fyli&yogh;an oþre syx sealmes, þa syn &yogh;esungen mid "Alleluia"; æfter þam filye þæt captel of þare apostele lare, þat beo &yogh;esed buten bocc, & &that; ferss, & þeo healsung&yogh;ebun, þat is "Kyrieleyson", & þus sy &yogh;een|dod þeo] þreo Hs. se nihtlice uhtsang.

11.0: X. HU ME SCEALL SINGE VHTSANG ON SUMERLICHE TIME.
11.1: Fram eastron od kalendas nouembris sy at uhtsange &yogh;e|heoldon at] þat Hs. æalle þes sealmesanges mycelnisse, þe we her before þe we] þe þe Hs. &yogh;ecwedon, buton þam anum þat on nanre boc ne beo rædinge &yogh;ered, for þam scortum nihtum, æc for þam þreom ræddingan an redinge sy &yogh;eræd buten boc of þare ealden &yogh;ecydnisse, þare rædinge fyli&yogh;e an scort reps; & ealle þo odre þing sy &yogh;efyllod swa þe &yogh;esæd is: þæt sy swa, þæt næfre læs sealme þe] we Hs. ne sy &yogh;esungen æt uhtsange þonne twelf, wiþuton: "Domine quid multiplicati sunt" & "Venite exultemus Domino ".

12.0: XI. BE SUNNAN DEGES VHTSANGE AND HU ME SCEALL ARISEN ON ÞA NEHT.
12.1: On þan sunnenda&yogh;e man sceal raþor arison to uhtsange. On þam uhtsange man sceal healdon þæt ylca &yogh;emet, þe we er bufan &yogh;ecwedon, þæt is be twelf sealme; syngan man ærest syx sealmes & þæt fers, æfter þam, heom eallum endebyrdlice sittende, beon &yogh;eræd feower readinge mid feower repsum; æfter þam feorþe ræpse, þenne man synge " Gloria patri ", anan arisan ealle mid arwyrþnesse, & syngan oþre syx sealmes mid þreom æntæfne & þæt fers. Þæræfter beon &yogh;ered efsona odræ feower rædinge mid heore repsan on þa ylce endebyrdnesse, endebyrdn.] endeþyrdn. Hs. þe we bufon cwedon. Þaræfter þri canticles beon &yogh;æsæd of þare wite&yogh;en bocan, swilce þy abbodesse hafod &yogh;esette, þa beon mid "Alleluia" &yogh;esungena. And syddon þæt fers & &yogh;eseald þare abbodesse bletsunge, beon &yogh;eræd oþere feower rædunge of þare niwe cydnesse þare ænbyrdnesse, þe we before cwedon. Æfter þam ferþa repsa be&yogh;inn þeo abbedesse þane lofsang: "Te deum laudamus"; þonne he beo &yogh;eendod, ræde se preost þæt godspell mid arwirdnysse & mid godcunden e&yogh;e, heom eallum standende; æt þæs godspelles endunge andswarie ealle "Amen", ænd þaræfter be&yogh;inne se preost: "Te decet laus", & æfter þare bletsunge sy a&yogh;unne se dæ&yogh;redsang.
12.2: Seo endbyrdnesse sunnenda&yogh;ene uhtsanges sy &yogh;elice &yogh;heal|den uhtsanges aus utsanges corrig. on ælcne tymen, &yogh;e on wintre &yogh;e on sumere, buton hit færlice swa &yogh;elimpe, þæt man læter arise, þonne hit &yogh;ebyri&yogh;e, & man bædæle rædin&yogh;e odde repsas &yogh;escyrte, þat ne &yogh;ewurþe, þat þyllic &yogh;ymelest &yogh;elimpe. Sy &yogh;eorne bewarnod, þæt hit ne &yogh;eorne, -orne auf Ras., ursprüngl. scheint &yogh;erne gestanden zu haben. &yogh;esele; þæt &yogh;if hit &yogh;elimpe, dædbete heo on&yogh;en God on þan &yogh;ebedehuse, þurh hwylcere &yogh;yemelyste hit &yogh;elamp.

13.1: On þam dæ&yogh;rædsange on sunnendæ&yogh;e ærest man sceal singen þæne syxandsyxti&yogh;eþan sealm wiþuton anteafne for|þrihte; æfter þam beo &yogh;esed se fiftu&yogh;eþe mid " Alleluia "; æfter þam beo &yogh;esæd se hundsyfenteoþe & se twaandsyxtu&yogh;eþa, þær|æfter þe bletsungen & se lofsealm, þonne an redinge of apo|calypsi buten boc, þonne reps, ymne, fers, se sang of þan gode|spelle, hælsunge, & swa beod &yogh;efellod.

0.14: XIII. BE WURUCDAE&yogh;EN DÆ&yogh;RÆDSANGE. On weorcda&yogh;um dæ&yogh;redsanges weordung is þus to heal|denne, þæt is þat se syxansyxtu&yogh;eþe sealm, þat is "Deus mi|sereatur nostri" sy &yogh;ecwedon buton antiefne, sumdæl dra&yogh;ende, ealswa on sunnenda&yogh;en, þæt ealle ma&yogh;en coman to þan fiftu|&yogh;edan sealme, þe is mid antefne to be&yogh;eonnenne, þat is "Mise|rere mei Deus". Æfter þan odre twe&yogh;ene sealmes beon &yogh;esed æfter &yogh;ewunelicum þeaweum, þat is on monandæ&yogh;e se fifte sealm & se fifandþritu&yogh;eþa, þat is "Uerba mea", & "Dixit iniustus"; fifandþritu&yogh;eþa] fifandfiftu&yogh;eþa Hs. on þan þridde da&yogh;e se twaandfeortu&yogh;eþe sealm & se syxand|fiftu&yogh;eþa, þat is "Judica me Deus", & "Miserere mei Deus , mi|serere mei"; on þan feorþe dæ&yogh;e, se þreoandsyxtu&yogh;eþa & feor|andsyxtu&yogh;eþa, þat is "Exaudi Deus orationem meam cum deprecor" & "Te decet ympnus"; on þan fiften dæ&yogh;e se syfene|andhundeahtati&yogh;eþa & se ni&yogh;enandhundeahtati&yogh;eþa, þat is " Domine 15.-16. syfeneandhundeah|teteþa] -hundseofenteþa Hs. -hundeahtati&yogh;eþa] -hundneo&yogh;onti&yogh;eþa Hs. Deus salutis mee", & " Domine refugium"; on þan syxte dæ&yogh;e se fifandhundseofentu&yogh;eþa & se anendhundni&yogh;enteoþa, þat is "Notus in Judea Deus ", & "Bonum est confiteri Domino "; on þan seterdæ&yogh;e se hundredeþeandtwaandfeortu&yogh;eþa, þat is " Do|mine hundred.] hudr. Hs. exaudi orationem meam auribus percipe", & se canticle deutronomio, þat is "Audite celi", se sy todælud on twe&yogh;en glorian. Elles odrum dæ&yogh;um on þare wucum sy &yogh;esungan an canticle of þare wte&yogh;an boc, þe to þam dæ&yogh;e belympd, swa wte&yogh;an, das e aus o radirt. ‖ belympd] belimpd aus bel&yogh;mpd corrigirt Hs. swa hit þeo romanisce cyrce healde, þat is on monandæ&yogh;e "Confitebor", on tiwesdæ&yogh;e "Ego dixi", on wodnesdæ&yogh;e "Exul|tauit", tiwersdæ&yogh;e Hs. on þunresdæ&yogh;e "Cantemus", on fridæ&yogh;e "Domine audiui". Ææfter þam ælce dæ&yogh; þæne lofsealme, &that; is "Laudate dominum de celis", syþon an ræding of þare apostole lare &yogh;emendlice of] on Hs. buten boc &yogh;ecweþon, se reps, hymne, fers, se canticle of þam godspelle, þæt is "Benedictus", þe helsunge, þæt is "Kyrieleison" & hit beod &yogh;efyllod. Ne sy na &yogh;eendod naþer ne dæ&yogh;redsang ne æfensang an nane wise, buton &that; drihtelice &yogh;ebedd, þat is "Pater noster", 33-34. an nane] anane Hs. drihtelice] drhtel. Hs. beo &yogh;esed of þare abbodesse, &that; ealle &yogh;ehyran for þan dornan of unþeawan, þe beod &yogh;ewunod to aspringænne, þæt hi&yogh; beon &yogh;enydd þurh þæs ylcæs &yogh;ebedes behæse, þe hi&yogh; sægged: "Drihten, &yogh;ebedes] &yogh;ebes Hs. for&yogh;if us ure synnan, swa swa we for&yogh;ifod þan, þe wid us habbod agylt", clensye hi sylfon of þillican unþeowon. Æt ælcan odrum tidum þæs ylcæs &yogh;ebedes lætemeste dæl beo &yogh;esed, &that; fram eallum sy &yogh;eandswerod: " Sed libera nos a malo". &that; f. Hs.

15.0: XIV. HU MAN SCEALL SINGAN ON HAL&yogh;ENAN MESSEDA&yogh;UN.
15.1: On Godes hal&yogh;ena freolstydum & on æalcan odrum masse|dæ&yogh;um, swa swa we habbod &yogh;esed, þat man sceal don on þan sunnenda&yogh;e, eallswa beo þonne &yogh;edon; wiþutan þan &that; þe sealmes & anteofenes & rædingan, þe &yogh;erysod to þan dæ&yogh;e, beon &yogh;esæd, æc þat ylca &yogh;emett, þæt her bufon awriton is, hit beo &yogh;eheldon.

16.0: XV. ON HWYLCE TIME MAN SCEALL SEC&yogh;AN "ALLELUIA".
16.1: Fram eastron forte pentecosten sy "Alleluia" buton todæled|nesse &yogh;esungon, æ&yogh;þor &yogh;e on sealmum &yogh;e on repsum. Fram Das 2. &yogh;e] we Hs. pentecosten od lenctenes an&yogh;ynne, ælce niht æt uhtsange sy "Alleluia" &yogh;esungon mid þan syx æftresealmum; ælcan sunnan|niht wiþuton lenctane þa canticlas & dæ&yogh;rædsang, primsang, undernsang, middæ&yogh;sang, nonsang mid "Alleluia" si &yogh;esunge; æfensang beo &yogh;esed mid antiefene; þe repses næfre ne sy &yogh;e|sungone mid "Alleluia", buton fram eastron od pentecosten. alle|leua Hs. ‖ buton] huton Hs.

17.0: XVI. HU ME SCEALL ON DA&yogh; GODES WEORC WYRCEAN.
17.1: Vte we don swa swa se wyte&yogh;a cwed: "Seofensydum on dæ&yogh; ic þe, drihten, herode & þin lof sæde". Þæt hæli&yogh;e seofen|fealde &yogh;etell byd þus þurh us &yogh;efillod, &yogh;if dæ&yogh;redsang, prim|sang, undernsang, middæ&yogh;sang, nonsang, æfensang, nihtsang 1-2. primsang, g aus einem m corrig. und rad. undernsant Hs. beod &yogh;efillod þurh ures deowdomes þenunge; fordi bi þan tydum se wtega sede: "Seofontydum on þan dæ&yogh;e hic, drichten, þe herode"; eac se ylca wite&yogh;a be þan uhtweccum þus se&yogh;d: "To middere nihte ic aras, drihten, þe to andettene". Eornestlice, on þisum tyman herian we urne scyppand for þan doman of þisum] þirum Hs. his rihtwisnesse, þat is on þan dæ&yogh;rede, on prime, on under|nen, on mydde&yogh;i, on none, on efene, on nihtsange, þat is compli; & on þare niht arise we & drihtene we we] &yogh;e Hs. and&yogh;iettan.

18.0: XVII. HU FELAN SEALMAS MAN SCEALL TO ÞAN DA&yogh;TIDEN SEC&yogh;EN.
18.1: Nv we habbad &yogh;efadod þa endebyrnysse þes sealmsanges, þe to uhtsange odde dæ&yogh;redsange &yogh;ebyred; ute nu behawian be þam odrum tydum. To primsange syn þri sealmes &yogh;e|cwedene ælc on sundran & na under anum "Gloria"; ær man þe sealmes be&yogh;ynne, sy ymne &yogh;esungen, þe to þere tyde be|limpe, &yogh;esunsungen Hs. æfter þam ferse: " Deus in adiutorium meum intende". Æfter &yogh;eendun&yogh;e þære þreore sealme sy an captel &yogh;ecweden & þat fers & "kyrieleison", & þo beon mid &yogh;ebedon &yogh;eendode. On undern & on mide&yogh;i & on non þat ylce &yogh;ebed þæra ylcan endebyrdnysse sy &yogh;ewurdod, þat is mid ferse & mid ymne þæra tyda, mid þreom sealmum, mid rædinge & mid ferse & mid "kyrieleison", & swo mid &yogh;ebede beon &yogh;eendode. Gyf it mycel &yogh;eferæden is, sy hi mid antiefene, & &yogh;yf seo &yogh;eferedden lytel byd, syn hi forþricte buton ant&yogh;efena &yogh;esungena. Ðes for|hricte Hs. æfensanges lof sy mid feor sealmum &yogh;eendod mid heora anteo|fenum, feor] feorþe Hs. & syddan sy anes capteles reding &yogh;ecweden, & syddan &yogh;ecweden] &yogh;echeden Hs. reps & se ambrosien, &that; is se ymne, & þat fers & se lofsang on þan godspelle, þat is: "Magnificat", halsun&yogh;, þat is: "Kyrieleison", & drihtenlic &yogh;ebed, þat is: "Pater noster", & sy swa mid &yogh;ebede &yogh;eendod. Nihtsang, þat is cumplie, si mid þrim sealmen &yogh;een|dod; þe sealmes syn &yogh;esungene forþrihte butan antiefene, & sydan ymen, þe to þære tyde belimpe, & anes capteles ræding & fers & "kyrieleison" & seo bletsun&yogh;, & swa beo hit &yogh;eendot.

19.0: XVIII. BE HWYLCERE FADUN&yogh;E MAN SCEALL ÞA HWYLCERE] hwylecwe Hs. SEALMES SIN&yogh;ON.
19.1: Syn æfre þa dæ&yogh;lican tida on frumen be&yogh;unnenne mid ferse: " Deus in adiutorium meum intende", and mid " Gloria patri "; & æfter þam ymen, þe to þære tyde belimpe. Æfter þam feower capitles, þat is feower todala an&yogh;in þæs hundtweon|ti&yogh;edanandeahteteþan hundtweonti&yogh;edanandeahte|teþan] hundtwenti&yogh;edan Hs. sealmes, &that; is: "Beati inmaculati" od: "legem pone"; on þam odrum tidum, &that; is on undern & on mid|de&yogh;i & on non þri capitles syn &yogh;esungene of þam forseadan sealme, þat is on undern fram "legem pone" od "portio mea", od] dd Hs. fram "portio mea" od "defecit", fram "defecit" od "lucerna". On monendæ&yogh;e to prinsonge syn &yogh;esun&yogh;ene þri sealmes, &that; is se forma & se oder & se syxte, þæt is "Beatus uir", "Quare fremuerunt" & " Domine , ne in furore"; & swa odrum dæ&yogh;um on þære wucan syn fordon þry sealmes &yogh;esun&yogh;en od þone ny&yogh;ontuþe sealm, swa þonne &that; se ny&yogh;ede sealm & se seofentude syn todeoled on twe&yogh;en glorian, þæt is "Confitebor" & "Diligam te". And swo syn &yogh;efadod, þat uhtsan&yogh; sy be&yogh;unnen on sunnannihtum fram þam twenti&yogh;eþan sealme, þat is " Domine , in uirtute".
19.2: On monandæ&yogh;e to undernsan&yogh;e & to middæ&yogh;essange & to nonsange syn to ælcan þisse tide þry capitles &yogh;esungene of þam ny&yogh;an capitelum, þe to lafe synd of þam hundtweonti&yogh;edan|andeahteteþan to lafe] to f. Hs. sealme, þat is "lucerna pedibus" od "ad Dominum cum tribularer". Sy þonne þus &yogh;eendod se hundtweonti&yogh;eda|&-se-eahteteoþa sealm on twam da&yogh;um, þat is on sunneda&yogh;e & twam] þam Hs. on monendæ&yogh;e, on tywesdæ&yogh;e on undern & on myddey & on non syn þri sealmes to ealcen þære tyde &yogh;esun&yogh;ene of þysum ny&yogh;on sealmum, þat is fram þam hundtweontu&yogh;eþeandni&yogh;eon|teoda sealmum od þone hundtweonti&yogh;ean-&-þan-seofanandtweon|ti&yogh;eþon; þa niyon sealmes syn dæ&yogh;hanlice &yogh;eedlæhte ofer ealle niyon] niwon Hs. wucan &yogh;eond þa sylfa tida od þone sunnendæ&yogh;, &that; is "ad Do|minum cum tribularer" od "sepe expugnauerunt"; ymnes and capitle, readinge and fers & halsun&yogh;a syn anum &yogh;emete &yogh;e|healdene eallum dæ&yogh;um, be þam þe we ær cwedon, & swa efre eft be&yogh;unne on þone sunnedæ&yogh; fram þam undtweonti&yogh;edan-&|tane-eahtetuþe sealma, þat is "Beati inmaculati".
19.3: Se æfensang sy de&yogh;hamlice &yogh;eendod mid feower sealme dreame. Þæs sealmes be&yogh;innan fram þam hundtwenti&yogh;eþon|&-þam-ny&yogh;eþan; od þone hundtweonti&yogh;eþan-&-þane-seofenand|feowerti&yogh;eþan, þat is fram "Dixit Dominus " od "laudate Domi|num de celis", buton þam, þe þær betweox ascyrede synd to odrem tydsan&yogh;um, þat is fram þam hundtweonti&yogh;eþonand|seofeonti&yogh;eþon od þone hundtwenti&yogh;eþenandseofenandtwenti&yogh;edon, -seofeonti&yogh;eþon] -seofeorti&yogh;eþon Hs. þat is fram "Confitemini" od "Sepe expugnauerunt", & buten fram] über der Zeile nachgetragen. þam hundtwentu&yogh;eþanandþreoandþritti&yogh;eþan & þan hundtwenti|&yogh;eþanandtwaandfeortu&yogh;eþan, &that; is "Ecce nunc" & " Domine exaudi orationem meam ", elles ealle þa odre syn to þam æfendreame &yogh;esungene. Forþan þe þæs sealm&yogh;etales is elles to lit, þa þri meste sealmes sceolen beo todeolede on tweien glorian, þat is se hundtweonti&yogh;eþe-&-se-eahteandþritti&yogh;eþa & se hundtwenti|&yogh;eþe-&-se-þreoandfeorti&yogh;eþe is fehlt Hs. & se hundtwenti&yogh;eþeandfeorandfeor|ty&yogh;eþe, þat is " Domine probasti me" & "Benedictus" & "Exaltabo te domine "; se hundtwenti&yogh;eþa-&-se-syxti&yogh;eþa, forþam he litel is, he sceal beon &yogh;eþed þam hundteonti&yogh;eþan-&-þam-fifteoþan & &yogh;eþed] &yogh;esed Hs. ‖ hundteonti&yogh;.] hundfeorti&yogh;. Hs. þa twe&yogh;en to anum sealme &yogh;esungene, þat is "Credidi" & "Lau|twe&yogh;en] tw&yogh;e&yogh;en Hs. date dominum omnes gentes ". To eacan þære endebyrdnysse þæra sealma þæs æfensanges syn odre þin&yogh; &yogh;efyllede, swa ic bufan &yogh;ewissode, þat is redinge, repses, ymne, fers, canticles, þat is "Magnificat".
19.4: To nihtsange man sceal þa sylfan sealmes ælce niht &yogh;eed|læcan, þat is þone feorþan & þone hundny&yogh;eteoþe & þone hundtweonti&yogh;edanandþriandþritti&yogh;odan, &that; is "Cum inuocarem", -andþri-] & þri zweimal geschrieben. "Qui habitat", "Ecce nunc".
19.5: Ðus &yogh;efadodre endbyrdnisse þes dæ&yogh;hamlican sealmsanges, ealle þa oddre sealmes, þe þær to lafe synd, syn &yogh;elice todæ|lede to þam seofen uhtsangum þære wucan, swa þat þa mestan uhtsang.] uths. Hs. syn todælede on tweien glorian, þat synd "Noli emulari", "Exur|gat Deus ", "Saluum me fac", "Attendite" "Misericordias domini ", "Benedic anima ", "Confitemini domino et inuocate", "Confitemini" se oþer, "Confitemini" se þridde, & swo to ælcen uhtsange syn tweolf sealmes &yogh;esungenne. We þæs heahlice myne&yogh;ad, &yogh;yf tweolf] teolf Hs. ‖ Nach &yogh;esungenne ein neuer Absatz und das Folgende wie ein neues Capitel behandelt, wozu vom Rubricator die Ueberschrift: Seid ure hlaford sancle bene|dihit. ‖ We] þe Hs. hwam þises sealmessanges fadun&yogh; & endebyrdness mislicad, fadi&yogh;e he sel & endebyrde, &yogh;yf him swa þince; swa þeh þat he þas &yogh;yme, &that; &that; hundredandfifti&yogh; þæs sæalteres sealma syn &that; &that;] &that; he &that; Hs. on ælcere wucan ealle to þam tydsangum todælede & &yogh;esungene, forþi hit is elles to slac mynecene þeoudom & heore hyrsum|nesse, &yogh;yf hi læsse sin&yogh;ad on þare wucan þonne þone saltere eallne mid &yogh;ewunelican cantica; wæ ræded, þat þa ealdan wæ] danach Rasur 1 Buchst. fæderes on anum dæ&yogh;e þæt þæt] þæt &that; Hs. stidlice &yogh;efyllen, þæt wylle Crist, þat we asolcene & awacede on anre wucan &yogh;elesten.

20.0: XIX. HU MAN SCEALL SIN&YOGH;ON TOFOREN UREN DRIHTEN.
20.1: Y&yogh;hwar we &yogh;elyfad, &that; Godes andwyrdnys sy & &yogh;esyhd, & his ea&yogh;an behaldad æ&yogh;der &yogh;e þa godan &yogh;e þa yfelan; þeah swydest we þæs buton ælcere tweonunge &yogh;elyfan, þonne we tweonunge zweimal geschrieben. æt Godes weorce wuniad. Fordi þonne syn we a &yogh;emyndi&yogh;e, þes þe se wyte&yogh;a þus cwed: "Ðeowiad eowran drihtne mid e&yogh;e"; and eft: "Syn&yogh;ad wislice", &: "On engla &yogh;esyhde ic sin&yogh;e þe". Eornestlice, uton besceawian, hu we wunian on Godes &yogh;esyhþe & on his engla; & þonne swa standan æt & bis engla auf Ras. þan sealmsange, þat ure mod &yogh;eþwærlæce mid þæs mudes clypiunge.

0.21: XX. BE WURÐNESSE &YOGH;EBEDENE, ODÐE HU MAN SCEAL &YOGH;OD BEDDAN. BEDDAN scheint aus beodan corrig. &YOGH;yf we mid rican mannan hwæt embe ure neode manian wyllad, þæt we ne &yogh;edyrstlæcad buton mid micelre eadmod|nysse; micele swidor is to halsienne ealra &yogh;esceafta drihten mid ealre eadmodnysse & mid ealre underþeodnesse & modes hlutternesse! We na ne wanan, þat we na þurh þa manifeald|nesse ura &yogh;ebeda syn &yogh;ehyrede, ac mid ure heortan hlutter|nesse & mid teara onbryrdnesse ura &yogh;ebeda beod anfonge. Fordi onbyrdn. Hs. þonne þat &yogh;ebed sceal beon scort & hlutter, buton hwa mid godcundre onbrirdnesse &yogh;emanod sy, þat heo hyre &yogh;ebed &yogh;elenge; an metinc&yogh;e þeah þæs &yogh;eferes sy &that; &yogh;ebed &yogh;escyrt, & &yogh;eworh|tum beacna fram þam ealdre ealle endemes arisan.

22.0: XXI. BE MYNSTRES TEODIN&YOGH;EALDRUM. Yyf] Wyf Hs.
22.1: Yyf seo &yogh;eferæden mycel sy, syn &yogh;ecorene of dan sylue &yogh;esustre, þa þe godes &yogh;ewitnesse syn & hal&yogh;re drohnun&yogh;e, & syn &yogh;esette teodin&yogh;ealdre, þa syn embhidi&yogh;e and cariende embe hyre ealderscipes on eallum þingum æfter Godes beobodum & heore abbodesse hese. Syn þa ealdres swilce &yogh;ecorene, þat se abbodesse hyre byrdena on hi todælen ma&yogh;e; ne syn hi &yogh;ecorene be nanre endebyrdnesse, ac be lifes &yogh;eearnunge & wisdomes, -es aus -os corrig. wisdomes lare. Gyf heora hwilc þurh þane truwan hyre eal|derscipes onhefd] onhefhd Hs. ferin&yogh;a toþint & hi&yogh; on modi&yogh;nesse onhefd, & heo on þam leahtre byd onfunden to fornimende, sy hyre æne &yogh;estyred & eft & þriddan syde; gyf heo þanne swa ne bete & rihlice, sy heo of dam ealderscipe aworpen, & oder sy on &yogh;esett, þe ealderscipe] ealdelsc. Hs. þæs weorde sy. And þæt sylfe we settad & tæcead be þere priore.

0.23: XXII. HU MYNECENE SLAPAN LIGGEN. Anlipi&yogh;e mynecena &yogh;eond ænlypi&yogh;e bedd restan. Hi&yogh; bed|reaf onfon æfter heora drohtnun&yogh;e &yogh;emete & æfter heora abbod|esse dihte. Gyf hit beon mæ&yogh;e, hi&yogh; ealle on anan hus ræstan; gyf seo ferreden to þam mycel sy, þat hi&yogh; ne mæ&yogh;on, tynum odde tweonti&yogh;um on anum inne æt&yogh;ædere restan mid heora ealdra, þe embe hi&yogh; carian. Leoht on þan sylfum inne singallice ofer ealle niht byrne od leohtne mor&yogh;en. Hi&yogh; &yogh;e|weddode & be&yogh;yrde reston & nane seax be heora sydan nabban, þe læste hy on slæpe &yogh;ewundede weorþan, ac þat hi&yogh; æfere hi&yogh;] is Hs. &yogh;earwe syn, & &yogh;eworhtum beacne hi&yogh; buton elcunge arysende caflice &yogh;ewilc odre foresteppe & to þam Godas weorce efste — efste] epste Hs. þat þonne sy mid michelre stædþinesse & &yogh;emedfestnesse. Seo &yogh;eo&yogh;ad na &yogh;etan&yogh; lic&yogh;e, ac seo yld þa &yogh;eo&yogh;ode to lic&yogh;e. To þam Godes werce arisende, heore ælc odre myne&yogh;ye, þat þa slapele nane beladun&yogh;e nabban.

24.1: Gyf hwylc swuster on&yogh;yten byd toþunden, odde un&yogh;ehir|sum, odde mod&yogh;, odde ceoriende, odde on æni&yogh;um þin&yogh;um wydeward wunienda þam hal&yogh;um re&yogh;ule, & heora yldrena be|boda oferho&yogh;iend: þas þyllice æfter Godes bebode syn di&yogh;ollice mid wordum æne & odre syde &yogh;emine&yogh;od fram heora yldrenum. Gyf heo swa ne bete & hy sylfe ne &yogh;erihte, heo sy &yogh;eþread openlice beforan eallum. Gyf heo þonne swa &yogh;it hi sylfe ne &yogh;erihte, &yogh;if heo on&yogh;yt, hu hefitime wite hit is, heo amansumunge underhni&yogh;e; gyf heo þaonne &yogh;yt widerræde byd, heo licamlice wrace mid swin&yogh;elle þoli&yogh;e.

0.25: XXIV. BE ÞAM &YOGH;EMETE HU SCEAL BEON &YOGH;ELEN&YOGH;ED ÞEO þAM &YOGH;EMETE HU] fehlt, dafür Ras. von etwa 10 Buchst. Swa oft swa hi ador odde meon odde æni&yogh; þing niwen underfon, a&yogh;yfen hi æfre þæt ealde. Þa þe on ytin&yogh;e ahwider farod, nimen hi reaf of hræ&yogh;lhuse, & swa hi ham cuman of þam færelde, a&yogh;yfen hi a&yogh;ean. Sy eac on hræ&yogh;lhuse &yogh;ehealden æ&yogh;der &yogh;e mentles &yogh;e cyrtles sumedæle beteran þonne þa, þe hi &yogh;ewunelice weried; & notian þære, þe for hwilcere neode on ytin&yogh;e farad, & þa eft þere hræ&yogh;lþenestre betæce, swa hi ham cuman. To bedreafe &yogh;enoh is to habbenne meatta & hwitel & bedfelt & pyle. Ðeahhwædere þeo abbodesse sceall &yogh;elomlice scewian þa bedd & asecean for syndrium æhtum. Gyf hi hwa habbe, odde on hyre bedde funden sy, &that; heo fram hire abbodesse ne onfen&yogh; & þurh hyre &yogh;yfe, ne leafa, ne þafun&yogh;e næfde, underlic&yogh;e þeo þære hefe&yogh;estan & þære stidesten disce|pline. hefe&yogh;estan] davor steht hefestan, ist aber durchstrichen. Efre sceal beon fram þare abbodesse fram] danach nochmals fram, doch ausgestrichen. &yogh;eornlice bescewod & behealden þe cwyde, þe awriten is on behealden, -heal- auf Ras. ‖ cwyde] cyde Hs. þere becc, þe is &yogh;ehaten "Actus apostolorum", &that; is, æ&yogh;hylcum wæs &yogh;eseald, swa swa heo behofede & nyde hæfde. 0.58: LVII. BE MYNSTRES CRÆFTI&yogh;E MAN. Gyf cræfti&yogh;e menn on mynstre syn, be&yogh;an hi hire creft mid ealre eadmodnesse and &yogh;eornlice wyrcan, &yogh;yf hit þeo abbodesse &yogh;eþafod. Gyf man hwet becypan sculle, þes þe þa cræfti&yogh;e menn on mynstre wyrcad, locian þa, þe þone ceape drifad, &that; hi nan þing facenlices on þam ceape ne don; gemunan hi&yogh; æfre Ananiam & Safiram, þelæs þe hi&yogh; þone dead on hyre sawle þolian, þe hi licamlice þoledan, ælc þære þe on þisum odde on eni&yogh;um odrum mynstres þingum æni&yogh; þin&yogh; facenlices ded. 59.0: LVIII. BE ÞAM NIWAN SWUSTRAM HU ME SCEALL HI&YOGH; NIWAN] niþan Hs. UNDERFON.
59.1: Gyf hwa· niwan to mynstres drohnun&yogh;e &yogh;ecyrren wile, ne sy hyre na &yogh;edelice þes infares &yogh;etidod; ac do man ealswa swa se apostol cwed, &that; is &that; me &yogh;yrnlice fandi&yogh;e, hwader hi&yogh; mid Godes gaste afyllede syn. Gyf heo þonne &yogh;yt þurhwunad, sy heo &yogh;elæd eft to nicumra manna husa, & hyre me &yogh;eorne fondie, hwader heo þolomod sy & &yogh;eþyldi&yogh;. Eft embe syx mondas sy hyre &yogh;eræd eall þes reo&yogh;el fram forewerdon ende to oder, &that; heo &yogh;eorlice understonde, hwet hit sy, þe heo tofundad. 59.3: Sydan heo underfangen sy & innan cyrcan &yogh;ebroht, behate he beforan ealre &yogh;eferedenne Gode & eallum his hal&yogh;um, &that; heo stadælfæst on mynstre wunian wylle & hyre þeawes to Gode ealle wille &yogh;eweman & on hyrsumnysse þurhwunian; gyf þonne æfræhwenne þis behat abrecd, wite heo, þæt heo byd &yogh;enidered & &yogh;ehined, &that; is ascirod fram ælmihtium drihtene, þe heo &yogh;ebismerod. Write heo þeo fæstnun&yogh;e hyresylf mid hyre agenre hande, &yogh;yf þonne write ne cunne, bidde odere, þe writen cunnen, &that; hi aspelie, & heo sylf on þam &yogh;ewrite roden tacn mearcie & hi&yogh; swa fæstniende mid hyre a&yogh;ene hande uppan þæt altare alec&yogh;e. 61.0: LX. BE HALI&YOGH;E EALDRE ÞE WUNIAÐ ON WORULDLICRE WUNIUN&YOGH;E ÞE WYLNIAD INN TO MYNSTRE ÞAS WE CLEOPIAÐ NUNNE ODÐE OFFESTRE. CLEOPIAÐ, e über der Zeile.
61.1: Gyf hwylc abbodesse odde æni&yogh; ealdor of hali&yogh;re ende|byrdnisse &yogh;ewilnad, &that; me hi on mynecene mynstre underfo, ne beo heom naht rade &yogh;etidod. 63.0: LXII. (BE MYNSTRES SACERDUM.) (BE MYNSTRES SACERDUM)] Be endebyrdnesse þære &yogh;eferreædenne Hs.
63.1: &YOGH;yf hwylc abbodesse &yogh;eþafad, &that; mæssepreost odde diacon into mynstre &yogh;ange, toþi &that; hi&yogh; mæsse synge & þa unasec&yogh;end|lice unasec|&yogh;endl.] unaseo&yogh;endl. Warnian þe &yogh;eswustre, &that; hi nane sunderspæce nabbe wid þa mæsseprustes, ne wid heore þenin&yogh;mann. Gyf þære &yogh;eswustre &yogh;ehwilc hyre di&yogh;ele synne þan mæssepræste and&yogh;etten wille, sy þet &yogh;edon be þere abbodesse leafe inne þere cyrecen, na on di&yogh;ele stowe, ac swa, þæt þa &yogh;eswustre hyre onlocien mæ&yogh;en, ealswa hit beboden is þurh þa hal&yogh;en fæderes; gyf heore &yogh;ehwilc &yogh;euntrumod byd, &that; heo to cyricen &yogh;egan ne mæ&yogh;e, do hyre andetnesse on þan huse, þe heo on|wunat, on &yogh;esihde hyre swustre. 64.2: Ða &yogh;ingran fordi arwurdan hyra yldran, & þa yldran lufia heore &yogh;ingran. 67.0: LXVI. BE MUNSTRES &YOGH;EATWARDE. &YOGH;EATWARDE, t üb. d. Z.
67.1: To þes mynstres &yogh;eate beo &yogh;esett an eald mynecene & wis, þe wel cunne andsware &yogh;yfe and underfo, & swa ripe heo beo, &that; heo nelle wori&yogh;e, & scridan ne lyste. Swa rade se þe cume cnucie, odde se þearfe clypi&yogh;e, heo sona cwede: "Deo gratias", &that; is "Gode þanc", & hine &yogh;eorne bletsie & &yogh;eþwerlice mid Godes ei&yogh;e mid ofste and|swari&yogh;e mid þam wilme þære sodan lufe. Sy sylfe &yogh;eateward, &yogh;yf heo fultumes behofi&yogh;e, sy hyre an &yogh;ingre swuster betæht, þe mid hire wicni&yogh;e.
67.2: Gyf hit beon mei, &that; mynster beon sceall swa &yogh;estadelod, &that; ealle neodbehefe þin&yogh; þær bynnen wunian, &that; is wæter & mylne & bæchus & wyrtun & &yogh;ehwylce odre mystlice creftes, & ealle nydbehefe þing widinne þam mynstre beo, &that; þa widinne, w aus þ radirt. mynecene nabbe nane neode ut to worienne, fordi &yogh;if hi hit worienne, i über d. 68.0: LXVII. BE ÞAM &YOGH;ESWUSTRE ÞE ME FOR NYDE UT ON WE&YOGH;E SÆNT.
68.1: Þonne þa &yogh;eswustre sculen ahwyder faren, betæcen hi&yogh; hiselfe þære abbodesse &yogh;ebede odde ealra þære swustre, & ta hwile, þe hi&yogh; on fore beod, syn hi&yogh; on &yogh;emynde, & æt ælces tidsan&yogh;es ænde eall &yogh;eferreden heom fore &yogh;ebiddan. And þæs dæ&yogh;es, þe hi&yogh; ham cumad, astreccen hi&yogh; innen cyricen on midde þære flore æt ælces tidsan&yogh;es ende, & hi&yogh; ealle &yogh;emæn|lice for heom &yogh;ebiddan, &that; heom nan þing ne deri&yogh;e, þæs þe hi a&yogh;ilte on þam farelde, ador odþe þurh &yogh;esyhde, odde þurh odþe (1.)] odre Hs. &yogh;ehlyste æni&yogh;es yfeles, odde þurh ydele spece.
68.2: Ne hyre non ne &yogh;edyrstlæce, &that; heo odrum telle æt ham, hwet heo butan mynstre &yogh;eseah odde &yogh;ehyrde, fordi hit is micel mæ&yogh;ene tostencednes. And &yogh;if hit eni&yogh; dyrstlece, &that; heo hit do, underlic&yogh;e heo regolice styre, &that; is discipline; & eallswa, þæ ged ut of cloystre, odde elles ahwider, odde æni&yogh; þin&yogh; do, þeah þe hit litel þince, butan þære abbodesse hese.

69.0: LXVIII. BE ÞAM &YOGH;ESWUSTRE ÞE HEFITUME WICE BYD BETÆHT.
69.1: Gyf æni&yogh; hefityme odde unacumelic þin&yogh; æni&yogh;re swuster betæht byd, underfo heo þa hese hyre tæcendes mid ealre man|þwærnesse & mid eadmodre &yogh;ehyrsumnisse; gyf heo þonne sydde eallunge &yogh;efret, &that; þære byrdene hefinesse oferstihd &that; &yogh;emet hyre strængde, eft on &yogh;eþafenlice tide hyre mæ&yogh;enleaste hyre ealdre &yogh;ekyde þonne intin&yogh;e, hwi heo hit do ne me&yogh;, na mid modi&yogh;nesse ne mid widerspece widstande. Gyf syden þæs ealdres cwide þurhwunad & on hyre &yogh;ebod aheardad, wite þeo &yogh;in&yogh;ra mid &yogh;ewissa, &that; hit heore eall fremad, & mid sodre lufe þurh Godes truwan þa hyrsumnesse be&yogh;inne, þeah hyre nehwon onha&yogh;i&yogh;e.

70.0: LXIX. BE ÞAM ÞAT NAN ON ÞAM MYNSTRE NE DYRSTELECE BE þAM þAT NAN] Bet nan Hs. OÐRE MID WORDE WERI&YOGH;EN.
70.1: Swyde is to scunienne, þæt on nane wise nan mynecene on mynstre mid worde odre beweri&yogh;e, odde mid æn&yogh;um an&yogh;inne &yogh;eeal&yogh;i&yogh;e, þæh þe hi beo &yogh;esybbe. Ne sy þis on nanum &yogh;e|mete &yogh;edyrstleht fram mynecenehades manna, fordi of þam mæ&yogh; swide mycel saca ydelice arise. Gyf æni&yogh; þis ofer&yogh;ime þurh æni&yogh;re &yogh;edyrstnesse, beo hyre ealra teartlicost &yogh;estyrod.

0.71: LXX. BE ÞAM ÞAT NAN NE &YOGH;EDYRSTELICE OÐRE ÞRESCE. BE þAM þAT NAN] Bet nan Hs. Sy forboden on mynstre ælcere dyrstinesse intin&yogh;a. We &yogh;eændebyrdad & &yogh;esettad, &that; nan mynecene odre ne amansumian ne þrescen, butan þere abbodesse leafe. Ða þe misdod, beon eawun&yogh;a &yogh;eþreade beforan ealre &yogh;eferreddenne, &that; þære odre &yogh;ehwilc þurh þæt &yogh;ee&yogh;esed sy. Cyld&yogh;eon&yogh;e manna unþeawa eall &yogh;eferreden styre, & habben hyre micele &yogh;ymene od dæt fifteode &yogh;ear hyre ylde; &that; þonne sy &yogh;edon mid ealle &yogh;emete & mid eallum &yogh;esceade. Gyf hwilc heora þurh dyrstinesse on maran ylde yrsad & þreale &yogh;ebytt, buten þære abbodesse hæse, odde on þam sylfum cyldum mid un&yogh;esceade &yogh;ehatheortad, underlic&yogh;e heo re&yogh;ollice steore, forþi hit is þus awriten: "Ðæt þu nelle, &that; þe sylfe &yogh;edon sy, ne do sylfe, l auf Ras., wie es scheint f darunter. þu odrum".

72.0: LXXI. ÐÆT ÞA &YOGH;ESWUSTRE &YOGH;EHYURSUM&YOGH;E HEOM BETWEONAN. BETWEONAN] betweoran Hs.
72.1: Þeo godnesse of &yogh;ehyrsumnesse naht þære abbodesse anre is æfre to beodenne, ac ealle þa &yogh;eswustre heom betweone leoflice &yogh;ehyrsume beo; witon hi eac, &that; þurh hyrsumnysse heom byd we&yogh; &yogh;erimed to Godes myrcde. Sy æfre on forewearde þære abbodesse hese &yogh;edo & sydde ealdre, þe fram hyre to þam &yogh;esett synd, &that; hi&yogh; odrum bebeodan; we elles nane odrum ne &yogh;eþafiad, &that; heo &yogh;ebod æfter hese a&yogh;e; elles ællc odrum hyrsumi&yogh;e mid sodre lufe & mid mycelre embrirdnesse. Gyf hyre hwilc &yogh;eflit&yogh;eorn beo, sy hyre &yogh;estirod.
72.2: Gyf æni&yogh; swuster for æni&yogh;e þinge læsse odde mare fram odde] oddre Hs. hyre abbodesse byd undernumen odde fram æni&yogh;e hyre yldrena, odde on&yogh;yt, &that; hyre æni&yogh;ere mod wid hi astyred byd, þeah hit for &yogh;ehwæde & eadlice þinge sy, heo þærrihte hisylfe astrecce butan ælcere elcun&yogh;e & swa lange astreht æt hyre fote ligge, oddæt heo hyre yldrene mod &yogh;egladi&yogh;e & hyre bletsunge be&yogh;yte. Gyf æni&yogh; þis forsycd to donne, underfo heo re&yogh;olice styre; gyf heo on toþundennes þurhwunad, hy man of þam þurhwunad] þuwhw. Hs. mynstre mid ealle ut adræfe.

73.0: LXXII. BE &YOGH;ODE ANDE ÞE MENECENE HABBEN SCULLEM.
73.1: Swa swa yfel biternesse ande & æfst ascyred fram Gode & æfst] fæst Hs. & læt to helle, ealriht swa god ande & heriung ascyred fram synne & leahtrum & let to Gode & to ecan life. Fordi þonne mynecene þæne ærran andan awyrpen, þisne oderne mid hatan þæne] þære Hs. wylme sodre lufe began; ælc efste myd arwurdnesse & mid þæs upplican lifes &yogh;ewilnunge, hu heo odre on hali&yogh;e þeudome forþeon ma&yogh;e; hyre seocnesse æ&yogh;der &yogh;e of licaman &yogh;e of &yogh;e|þance sibsumlice heom beotwene forbere; ælc odrum to &yogh;eflites, hu hi swidest ma&yogh;e, hyrsumian; hyre nan ne fily&yogh;e hyre agen wille on þam þingum, þe heo hyresylfe nytwyrde tali&yogh;e & be|hefe, ac þam swidost, þe odrum furdur fremian ma&yogh;e, þonne hyre sylfe; deo sode lufe, þæ ealra mæ&yogh;ne mæst is & ealre hali&yogh;nesse will, wuni&yogh;e æfre betweone mynecene; Godes e&yogh;e toforen heom æfre sy, & hyre abbodesse mid clenre & mid eadmodre lufe lufian; nan þing hi heom inmedre ne læten, ne besorhre, þonne hyre drihten, þe us ealle &yogh;emænelice þurh his myldheortnesse to ece lyfe &yogh;elæde. Amen.

74.0: LXXIII. BE ÞAM þAT ÆALL RIHTWISNESSE ON ÞYSSERE RE&YOGH;OLE RIHTWISNESSE] rihtwissiesse Hs. ‖ RE&YOGH;OLE] relo&yogh;e Hs. NIS &YOGH;ESTAÞELOD. EXPLICIT REGULA SANCTI NIS] fehlt. Hs. BENEDICTI ABBATIS.
74.1: Þas regole we write, &that; we þurh hyre &yogh;ehealsumnesse on we write] ewrite, davor ein &yogh; radirt. ‖ we aus þe radirt. mynstre sumne del sceawie, þæt we habbad arwyrdnesse on þeawe odde an&yogh;inn of rihtfulle life.
74.2: Seo þe fullfremednesse hali&yogh;ere drohtnun&yogh;e habben wile, &that; synd &yogh;esette to lyfes bysene hali&yogh;era fædere lare, þære &yogh;e|mynd & &yogh;ehealdsumnes &yogh;elæt þa mynecene to fullþun&yogh;enre fre|mednesse. &yogh;ehealdsumne Hs. La, hwylc lare læt þone mann to re&yogh;olice life, hwylc boc odde sermun of þære ealden æ odde of þære niwe nis swide riht re&yogh;ol to mancynnes life? Odde hwilc boc, þe ure re&yogh;ol to] re auf Rasur , &yogh;ol über die Zeile hinaus a. d. Rand, dsgl. das folgende to auf dem Rande vor der nachsten Zeile. Es scheint re&yogh;ol ursprgl. ausgelassen und dann auf to geschrieben worden zu sein. lareowas macede, þe were on rihte &yogh;elafe, &that; ne se&yogh;d, &that; we &yogh;elafe, f auf ein &yogh; hinaufcorrigirt. þurh rihtne rynolne cume to þam þe us &yogh;esceop? Odde þa collatiuns, &that; Iohannes Cassianus awrat, & þere hali&yogh;ere manna lif, þe on Uitas Patrum is &yogh;eredd & þe regol ures hali&yogh;es fader Basilies, hwæt is hit elles bute &yogh;etymbrunge & tol hali&yogh;re manne tol] to Hs. & þere mynecene, þe wel & rihte libbad & &yogh;ehyrsume synde To sceame & to ascyndnesse hi synd us, þe asolcene synd & yfele & &yogh;ymeleaslice mid unrihte libbad.
74.3: Swa hwilc swa onnettende efst to þam heofonlice æþele &yogh;efremme ærest þurh Godes fultum þisne lytle re&yogh;ol, þe her awriten is, to an&yogh;inne godre drohtnunge; & swa æt nyxtan þurh Godes fultum þu cymst to mare &yogh;eþinde godre ma&yogh;ne & lare þære hal&yogh;ene, þe we bufe embe spece, &that; â &yogh;ewurde ece lif to leane & wunung mid Gode ealle þam, þe þisse re&yogh;ole blydelice fyliad.
